content:
You create smart links in your article's rich text fields, enabling rich text fields. 
Available in: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience.
Salesforce Knowledge is available in Essentials and Unlimited Editions with Service Cloud. 
User permissions needed to create articles: Manage Articles, Read and Create in the user profile.
In the rich text editor toolbar, click the Smart Link icon, choose publication status and language, select an article, and specify how the smart link opens.
Smart links use more characters than displayed; increase character limit if necessary.
title: Inserting Smart Links into Salesforce Knowledge Articles
